import { LabelImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Label
Labels allow user to show text with color and rounded background.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <LabelImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.LabelAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	app:labelVariant="warning|positive|important|neutral|disabled|highlight" />
```
for `app:labelVariant` you can choose one of the variant above.
